  • Method Details

    • extractTokenFromBearer

      String extractTokenFromBearer(String bearer) throws InvalidTokenException
      Extracts the token from the bearer string.
      Parameters:
      bearer - The bearer string.
      Returns:
      String The token.
      Throws:
      InvalidTokenException - if the token is invalid

    • createToken

      String createToken(Map<String,?> payload)
      Creates, signs and returns a new token with a given payload.
      Parameters:
      payload - The payload to add to the token.
      Returns:
      String The token.

    • verifyToken

      Object verifyToken(String token) throws IOException, NoSuchAlgorithmException, InvalidKeySpecException
      Verify a given token.
      Parameters:
      token - The token to verify
      Returns:
      Object an object containing the payload and other important information if token is valid, null if token is invalid
      Throws:
      IOException - if key file is not found
      NoSuchAlgorithmException - if the algorithm is not supported
      InvalidKeySpecException - if the key is invalid
      com.auth0.jwt.exceptions.JWTVerificationException - if token is invalid

    • getPublicKey

      PublicKey getPublicKey(String keyPath) throws IOException, NoSuchAlgorithmException, InvalidKeySpecException
      Loads the public key from the given path.
      Parameters:
      keyPath - the path to the key file
      Returns:
      PublicKey the key from the file in keyPath
      Throws:
      IOException - if the key file could not be read
      NoSuchAlgorithmException - if the algorithm is not supported
      InvalidKeySpecException - if the key specification in the file in keyPath is invalid

    • getPrivateKey

      PrivateKey getPrivateKey(String keyPath) throws IOException, NoSuchAlgorithmException, InvalidKeySpecException
      Loads the private key from the given path.
      Parameters:
      keyPath - the path to the key file
      Returns:
      PrivateKey the key from the file in keyPath
      Throws:
      IOException - if the key file could not be read
      NoSuchAlgorithmException - if the algorithm is not supported
      InvalidKeySpecException - if the key specification in the file in keyPath is invalid

    • createKeys

      void createKeys(String publicKeyPath, String privateKeyPath) throws NoSuchAlgorithmException, IOException
      Generates a key pair and saves it to the given path.
      Parameters:
      publicKeyPath - The path to save the key public key to.
      privateKeyPath - The path to save the key private key to.
      Throws:
      NoSuchAlgorithmException - If the algorithm is not supported.
      IOException - If the key pair could not be saved.

    • storeKeyInFile

      void storeKeyInFile(String path, Key key) throws IOException
      Stores a given key in a file located at the given path.
      Parameters:
      path - The path where the key should be stored.
      key - The key to be stored.
      Throws:
      IOException - If the key could not be stored.
